document_data.name: Fireblossom
document_data.mainbody: '''Fireblossoms''' were a species of flowering plants that blossomed in the summer and were a major part of summer festival of the sun celebrating [[Sune]] Firehair, in [[northwest Faerûn]].
document_data.History: By the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], summer [[Sunite]] festival was a common celebration during which many competitions took place, including fireblossom-gathering competitions. The flowers were then exchanged for gifts and used to decorate the festival grounds. The rewards were summer foods like fresh [[tomato]]s, [[squash]]es, and [[sunmelon]]s.
